document_data.name: Bottom Feeder
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bottom Feeder''''' was a riverboat run by a crew of [[dwarf|dwarves]].
document_data.Description: ''Bottom Feeder'' was as 20-foot-long (6.1 meters) square-bottomed riverboat built by dwarves. The crew propelled the ship using long poles to push it along. A locker on board stored a number of [[crossbow]]s, which were used by the ship's crew to defend the ship.
document_data.Activities: ''Bottom Feeder'' plied the waters of the [[Chionthar|River Chionthar]] from [[Baldur's Gate]] to [[Scornubel]], occasionally even as far as [[Iriaebor]].
document_data.Crew:
* [[Bumpo Thunderpuncher]]: Captain.
* [[Donat Thunderpuncher]]: Bumpo's brother; an accomplished navigator.
* [[Yipper Fishquisher]]: Cousin to Bumpo and Donat, brother to Quipper.
* [[Quipper Fishquisher]]: Cousin to Bumpo and Donat, brother to Yipper.
